<<<<<<< HEAD
Two treatises the first of fear, from Isa. 8, v. 12, 13, and part of the 14 : the second, The righteous man's refuge in the evil day, from Isaiah 26, verse 20 / by John Flavell. Flavel, John, 1630?-1691.
[11], 285 p.
Printed by H.H. for Robert Boulter, London : 1682.
Each of the treatises has special t.p. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======
